items.title: How speedster Zachariah Branch made a fast impression at Georgia
items.description: After transferring from USC, the elusive receiver has become the Bulldogs' most dangerous weapon.

items.title: Ducks' defense blanks Tech to reach CFP semis
items.description: Matayo Uiagalelei caused a fumble to set up a touchdown as the Ducks silenced Texas Tech 23-0 in the Orange Bowl to reach the College Football Playoff...
